docs.title: Wealth-OS
docs.text:
A modular operating system for building, scaling, and sustaining a business.

Use the side nav to explore worksheets for Strategy, Finance, Offers, GTM, Content, Systems, Metrics.

docs.title: Join Wealth-OS
docs.text: Build a cash-flowing one-person business with the exact systems I use.

docs.title: What you get
docs.text:
• Cash Map + Offers: simple finance + offer design worksheets.
  • GTM Playbooks: positioning, funnel, and content sprints.
  • Systems: repeatable ops (docs, templates, checklists).
  • Office Hours: live Q&A, teardown sessions (Pro/Advisory).
  • Updates: weekly changelog, new templates, and examples.

docs.title: 1) Free — Newsletter
docs.text:
Stay in the loop with new playbooks and templates.

Subscribe free

docs.title: 2) Pro — Toolkit + Community
docs.text:
All templates + private feed + group calls. - Price: $X / month or $Y / year

Join Pro

docs.title: 3) Advisory — 1:1 Help
docs.text:
Direct help implementing your offer/GTM/systems. - $Z / month (limited seats)

Book intro call

Not sure which to pick? Start free, then upgrade when you want templates and calls.

docs.title: What people say
docs.text: “Clear, fast, and practical. We shipped offers and started selling.” — Founder

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text: Can I cancel anytime? Yes. Do I get everything in Pro? Yes: all templates + future updates. Refunds? If it’s not useful in 7 days, email and we’ll sort it.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text: Questions? Open an issue on GitHub or email you@yourdomain.com.

docs.title: 4-Bucket Accounts Architecture
docs.text:
• Income (all inflows)
  • Bills (fixed costs)
  • Ops (tools, marketing)
  • Tax (set aside %)

[Action] Map your bank accounts/cards to these 4 buckets.
